charges.charge_description: 21:846 Conspiracy to possess w/intent to distribute &; distribute a quantity of marijuana, a Sch. I non-narcotic controlled substance (1)

charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCE IMPOSED BY THE COURT ON DEC. 15, 1995: 60 MONTHS IMPRISONMENT PLUS 5 YEARS SUPERVISED RELEASE with the standard conditions of supervised release. Deft. is to pay a fine of $200 w/o interest and a special assessment fee of $50 which are due immediately or on a schedule determined by the U. S. Probation Office or the Bureau of Prisons. The Court recommends that deft. support his minor children while in prison. The Court also recommends that deft. be confined at Butner. Deft. is allowed to self-report. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:846 Conspiracy to possess w/intent to distribute &; distribute a quantity of marijuana, a Sch. I non-narcotic controlled substance (1)

charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCE IMPOSED BY THE COURT ON DEC. 15, 1995: 30 MONTHS IMRISONMENT PLUS 5 YEARS SUPERVISED RELEASE with the standard conditions of supervised release. Deft. is to pay a fine of $2,000 w/o interest and a special assessment fee of $50 which are due immediately or on a schedule as determined by the U. S. Probation Office or Bureau of Prisons. Court recommends that deft. be designated as close to his home in Houston, TX as possible. Court also recommends that deft. pay child support while incarcerated. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:846 Conspiracy to possess w/intent to distribute &; distribute a quantity of marijuana, a Sch. I non-narcotic controlled substance (1)

charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCE IMPOSED BY THE COURT ON DEC. 15, 1995: 174 MONTHS IMPRISONMENT PLUS 5 YEARS SUPERVISED RELEASE with the standard conditions of supervised release. Deft. is to pay a $2,000 fine w/o interest and pay a special assessment fee of $50 which are due immediately or on a schedule determined by the U. S. Probation Office or Bureau of Prisons. Court recommends that deft. support his minor children while incarcerated. Court also recommends that deft. be designated as close to his home as possible, in Houston, TX, if possible. AMENDED JUDGMENT-EIGHTY-SEVEN (87) MONTHS IMPRISONMENT PER ORDER FILED SEPTEMBER 8, 1997, GRANTING GOVERNMENT'S RULE 35(b) MOTION. ALL OTHER TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THE JUDGMENT TO REMAIN THE SAME. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:846 Conspiracy to possess w/intent to distribute &; distribute a quantity of marijuana, a Sch. I non-narcotic controlled substance (1)

charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCE IMPOSED BY THE COURT ON 2/24/98: ONE HUNDRED THIRTY-TWO (132) MONTHS IN CASE NO. 5:94CR37-4-V; TWELVE (12) MONTHS IN CASE NO. 5:97CR212-1-V TO RUN CONSECUTIVELY TO THE SENTENCE IMPOSED IN CASE NO. 5:94CR37-4-V PLUS FOUR (4) YEARS SUPERVISED RELEASE IN CASE NO. 5:94CR37-4-V; &; THREE (3) YEARS IN CASE NO. 5:97CR212-1-V TO RUN CONCURRENTLY TO THE TERM IMPOSED IN CASE NO. 5:94CR37-4-V with standard conditions. Deft. is to pay an assessment fee of $100 which is due immediately. Assessment fee of $50 in case no. 5:94CR37-4-V &; assessment fee of $50 in case no. 5:97CR212-1-V. Any balance remaining will be paid on a schedule established by the U. S. Probation Office or Bureau of Prisons. Deft is ineligible for all federal benefits for a period of 10 years from today 2/24/98. Deft. is remanded to the custody of the U. S. Marshal. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:846 Conspiracy to possess w/intent to distribute &; distribute a quantity of marijuana, a Sch. I non-narcotic controlled substance (1)

charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCE IMPOSED BY THE COURT ON DECEMBER 15, 1995: 41 MONTHS IMPRISONMENT PLUS 3 YEARS SUPERVISED RELEASE with the standard conditions of supervised release. Deft. is to pay a fine of $400 w/o interest and a special assessment fee of $50 immediately or on a schedule as determined by the U. S. Probation Office or Bureau of Prisons. Court recommends that deft. provide support for his minor daughter while incarcerated. Deft. is to self-report. cc: USA, USM, USPO, defense counsel &; National Fine Center AMENDED JUDGMENT: 21 MONTHS IMPRISONMENT pursuant to Order filed August 29, 1996 granting Rule 35(b) Motion. All other terms and conditions of the judgment are to remain the same. (1)
